docs.snippet: The average price of regular gasoline nationwide has dropped another 25 cents a gallon in the past two weeks, to $2.47....

headline.main: Survey: US Gas Prices Fall 25 Cents Per Gallon
headline.print_headline: Survey: US Gas Prices Fall 25 Cents Per Gallon

docs.lead_paragraph: The average price of regular gasoline nationwide has dropped another 25 cents a gallon in the past two weeks, to $2.47.

docs.snippet: - Ajax Amsterdam, still smarting from a shock 4-0 Dutch Cup thrashing by Vitesse Arnhem on Thursday, left it late before finally easing past struggling Excelsior 2-0 in the league on Sunday....

headline.main: Ajax Leave It Late to Polish Off Struggling Excelsior
headline.print_headline: Ajax Leave It Late to Polish Off Struggling Excelsior

docs.lead_paragraph: - Ajax Amsterdam, still smarting from a shock 4-0 Dutch Cup thrashing by Vitesse Arnhem on Thursday, left it late before finally easing past struggling Excelsior 2-0 in the league on Sunday.

docs.snippet: One of Egypt's most prominent human rights groups announced Sunday that it will register under a restrictive law it and other organizations have decried as an attempt by the government to silence them....

headline.main: Egypt Human Rights Group to Register Under Restrictive Law
headline.print_headline: Egypt Human Rights Group to Register Under Restrictive Law

docs.lead_paragraph: One of Egypt's most prominent human rights groups announced Sunday that it will register under a restrictive law it and other organizations have decried as an attempt by the government to silence them.

docs.snippet: The ex-girlfriend of the man who ambushed two NYPD officers screamed for help after she was shot and said: "I can't die like this, please please help me," according to a neighbor who said she saw the woman and called 911....

headline.main: Neighbor Talks About Shooting Before NYPD Killings
headline.print_headline: Neighbor Talks About Shooting Before NYPD Killings

docs.lead_paragraph: The ex-girlfriend of the man who ambushed two NYPD officers screamed for help after she was shot and said: "I can't die like this, please please help me," according to a neighbor who said she saw the woman and called 911.

docs.snippet: New York City's subways — the nation's biggest mass transit network — serve more than 6 million daily riders who depend largely on a signal system that dates back to the Great Depression....

headline.main: NYC Subways Slowly Upgrading From 1930s-Era Technology
headline.print_headline: NYC Subways Slowly Upgrading From 1930s-Era Technology

docs.lead_paragraph: New York City's subways — the nation's biggest mass transit network — serve more than 6 million daily riders who depend largely on a signal system that dates back to the Great Depression.

docs.snippet: South Africa have called left-handed batsman Rilee Rossouw into their squad for the remaining two tests against West Indies after wicketkeeper Quinton de Kock was ruled out through injury....

headline.main: Rossouw Gets South Africa Test Call-Up
headline.print_headline: Rossouw Gets South Africa Test Call-Up

docs.lead_paragraph: South Africa have called left-handed batsman Rilee Rossouw into their squad for the remaining two tests against West Indies after wicketkeeper Quinton de Kock was ruled out through injury.

docs.snippet: The last movie of Peter Jackson's three "Hobbit" films rode to the top of U.S. and Canadian weekend box office charts, selling an estimated $56.2 million worth of tickets and boosting the holiday movie season that is crucial to Hollywood....

headline.main: Final 'Hobbit' Film Draws Holiday Season Crowds at Box Office
headline.print_headline: Final 'Hobbit' Film Draws Holiday Season Crowds at Box Office

docs.lead_paragraph: The last movie of Peter Jackson's three "Hobbit" films rode to the top of U.S. and Canadian weekend box office charts, selling an estimated $56.2 million worth of tickets and boosting the holiday movie season that is crucial to Hollywood.

docs.snippet: Manolo Gabbiadini, who is expected to leave Sampdoria next month, grabbed the equaliser in a 2-2 home draw with Udinese on Sunday that lifted his team up to fourth in Serie A....

headline.main: Gabbiadini Header Rescues a Point for Sampdoria
headline.print_headline: Gabbiadini Header Rescues a Point for Sampdoria

docs.lead_paragraph: Manolo Gabbiadini, who is expected to leave Sampdoria next month, grabbed the equaliser in a 2-2 home draw with Udinese on Sunday that lifted his team up to fourth in Serie A.

docs.snippet: From the International Herald Tribune archives: After failed ninth and 10th rounds of voting, the presidential election became the longest in the 18-year history of the Italian Republic in 1964....

headline.main: 1964: Tempers Flare as Italian Parliament Fails to Elect New President

docs.abstract: From the International Herald Tribune archives: After failed ninth and 10th rounds of voting, the presidential election became the longest in the 18-year history of the Italian Republic in 1964.

docs.snippet: Yazidis cheer Kurds as they drive along roads in the Sinjar Mountains after breaking an Islamic State siege. Nathan Frandino reports....

headline.main: Yazidis celebrate after Kurds break siege on Sinjar Mountains
headline.sub: Yazidis celebrate after Kurds break siege on Sinjar Mountains

docs.lead_paragraph: Yazidis cheer Kurds as they drive along roads in the Sinjar Mountains after breaking an Islamic State siege. Nathan Frandino reports.
